description:
Latest adventure: Exile (7/4/21)
Up next: Starwisp (7/5/21)

Crypt Shyfter is a series of silly text adventures & digital gamebooks filled with mighty heroes, evil shapeshifting cyborgs, and pizza!

Play the latest adventure in your browser or click below to download the complete series.

Genres I write in...
Sword & Planet, Fantasy, Science Fiction, Science Fantasy, Sword & Sorcery, Kung Fu, Wuxia, Weird Western, Military Sci-Fi, Horror

Play Crypt Shyfter if you like...
Aliens, robots, cowboys, gladiators, dinosaurs, barbarians, pirates, RPGs, turn-based battles, text based gameplay, silly storylines
